channel.title: setup on Sina Rüeger

item.title: uses
item.description: Hardware Computer 💻: Apple MacBook Air (13”), iPad (10.2”) + Apple Pencil Noise cancelling earphones 🎧: Bose QuietComfort (> 4 years old, still work) Cloud computing ☁️: GCP (Google Cloud Computing) Analog sketching ✍️: Caran d'Ache 825 pen (blue) + plain white paper, no lines. Operating system MacOS (Laptop) Ubuntu (Cloud) Data science Languages: R, Python, command line tools Editor: Atom, RStudio for local R coding Terminal: iTerm Apps Browser 👀: Firefox (syncing bookmarks) Password manager 🔐: 1Password Organising 🤯: Trello Bookmarking 🔖: Pocket Reference manager 📒: zotero, bibtex Writing ⌨️: Grammarly Conference calls ☎️: Zoom Sketching/Taking notes 🎨: Paper, Notability Presentations: Keynote by MacOS, xaringan (R Markdown) Science Comm 👂📢: Twitter, CastBox for podcasts Misc Learning 🎓: Udemy Manduka Lite Yoga Mat 🧘 Coffee ☕: Mccamaster
